text: Never can we suspend the time.
author: Honkai Impact 3rd

text: 为世界上所有的美好而战。
author: 崩坏3

text: 我们终将重逢，在那不再需要告别的未来。
author: 崩坏3

text: If saving you is a sin, then I'll gladly become a sinner.
author: Honkai Impact 3rd

text: 纵使前路迷惘，也要把答案写在脚下。
author: 崩坏3

text: The world is imperfect. If it were perfect, it wouldn't be the world we love.
author: Honkai Impact 3rd

text: 愿此行，终抵群星。
author: 崩坏：星穹铁道

text: Soaring past the night, to trace the bright moonlight.
author: Robin · Honkai: Star Rail

text: To trace the bright moonlight.
author: Robin · Honkai: Star Rail

text: 使一颗心免于哀伤。
author: 知更鸟 · 崩坏：星穹铁道

text: This journey may be endless, but meaning is something we create ourselves.
author: Honkai: Star Rail

text: 纵使道路分岔，群星仍在前方。
author: 崩坏：星穹铁道

text: Keep walking. Even if the road leads nowhere, you'll have seen the stars along the way.
author: Honkai: Star Rail

text: 命运把你带到这里，不是为了让你原地踏步。
author: 崩坏：星穹铁道

text: Da capo.
author: Moon Halo

text: When the sky falls down, I will still stand my ground.
author: Moon Halo

text: We’ll meet again, in a world that doesn’t need goodbyes.
author: Moon Halo

text: 纵使终点注定，仍愿踏歌而行。
author: 昔涟

text: 月光照亮前路，也照见离别。
author: 昔涟

text: The night is long, but the dawn will come.
author: Lyrics

text: To be, or not to be: that is the question.
author: William Shakespeare

text: The course of true love never did run smooth.
author: William Shakespeare

text: We are such stuff as dreams are made on.
author: William Shakespeare

text: Brevity is the soul of wit.
author: William Shakespeare

text: If you cry because you have lost the sun, your tears will prevent you from seeing the stars.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: 如果你因为失去了太阳而流泪，那么你也将错过群星。
author: 泰戈尔《飞鸟集》

text: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: Let life be beautiful like summer flowers and death like autumn leaves.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: 世界以痛吻我，要我报之以歌。
author: 泰戈尔

text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: Was mich nicht umbringt, macht mich stärker.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: Wer ein Warum zu leben hat, erträgt fast jedes Wie.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: Wer mit Ungeheuern kämpft, mag zusehen, dass er nicht dabei zum Ungeheuer wird.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: I write to understand, not to explain.
author: Dan
